department.en: Master Program in Systems Biology and Bioinformatics, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering
department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系系統生物與生物資訊碩士班

goal.en: This course aims at introducing Java programming language such that students can understand how to design graphical interfaces using Java. At the beginning of this course, we will introduce the basic concept of Java, including loops, arrays, objects and file input/output etc. Later, we will focus on showing students how to implement graphical user interfaces. We expect that students can independently design graphical user interfaces via Java at the end of the semester.
goal.ch: 本課程目的在於讓學生知道如何使用Java設計使用者圖形化介面。我們將從基本的Java觀念開始介紹，逐步讓學生了解何為決策敘述、迴圈結構、陣列、物件和類別等重要概念。除此之外，我們會著重在使用者視窗設計的介紹，期待學生於學期未時能獨立使用Java完成一套圖形介面軟體。

content.en:
1 Introduction of Java
2 Fundamental Data Types
3 Decisions
4 Loops
5 Methods
6 Arrays and Array Lists
7 Input/Output and Exception Handling
8 Object and Classes
9 Midterm exam
10 Inheritance
11 Graphical User Interfaces
12 Swing
13 Advanced Graphical User Interfaces
14 Object-Oriented Design
15 Recursion
16 Sorting and Searching
17 The Java Collections Framework
18 Final exam
content.ch:
1. Java 基本介紹
2. 基本資料型別
3. 決策
4. 迴圈
5. 方法
6. 陣列
7. 檔案讀寫(輸入/出)
8. 物件與類別
9. 期中考
10. 繼承
11. 圖形化介面
12. Swing
13. 進階圖形化介面
14. 物件導向設計
15. 遞迴
16. 排序與搜尋
17. 進階資料型別
18. 期末考

textbook.en: Java For Everyone: Late Objects, 2nd Edition
textbook.ch: Java For Everyone: Late Objects, 2nd Edition

grading.en: Class participation/Attendance 20% Mid-term project 40% Final Project: 40%
grading.ch: 課堂表現/出席率 20% 期中報告 40% 期末專題 40%

flex_desc.en: The course will be online teaching, if the COVID-19 outbreak gets worst.
flex_desc.ch: 因應疫情需求，若疫情嚴重時改為視訊授課。

domain.en: 專業知識領域 、 計算分析領域
domain.ch: 專業知識領域 、 計算分析領域
